description_expanded: Febreze Sweet Watermelon Vine Air Freshener Spray (8.8oz) is designed to deliver everyday reliability with thoughtful details suited for home fragrance. An odor-fighting air freshener spray that eliminates odors instead of just masking them. In a sweet Sweet Watermelon Vine scent. Built for convenience and value, it balances quality materials with practical features you can rely on at home, on the go, or as a thoughtful gift.
